name: Beef Macaroni Casserole
author: Helen Menz

ingredients.name: (4 oz.) can taco sauce or some taco seasoning

instructions: Cook macaroni in water with salt until tender. Fry onion and ground beef in small amount of cooking oil until partially cooked. Add chili powder and taco sauce; mix well. Add soup and tomato juice. Mix in macaroni; pour into casserole. Cover with cheese. Bake covered at 350Â° for 30 minutes.
